mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROJECT VALUES(PROJECT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memNo}, #{proSubject}, #{proExp}, SYSDATE, #{publicYN}, 'N', 'N', NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT PRO_NO as proNo, MEM_NO as memNo, PRO_SUBJECT as proSubject, PRO_EXP as proExp, PRO_DATE as proDate, PUBLIC_YN as publicYN, COMP_YN as compYN, COMP_DATE as compDate FROM PROJECT WHERE MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT PRO_NO as proNo, MEM_NO as memNo, PRO_SUBJECT as proSubject, PRO_EXP as proExp, PRO_DATE as proDate, PUBLIC_YN as publicYN, COMP_YN as compYN, COMP_DATE as compDate FROM PROJECT WHERE PUBLIC_YN = 'Y' AND DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT PRO_NO as proNo, MEM_NO as memNo, PRO_SUBJECT as proSubject, PRO_EXP as proExp, PRO_DATE as proDate, PUBLIC_YN as publicYN, COMP_YN as compYN, COMP_DATE as compDate FROM PROJECT WHERE PRO_NO=#{proNo} AND DEL_YN='N'
